name: Puppet of Einzbern, Irisviel
ability: 【AUTO】［(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Sign of Determination" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one level 1 or higher 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text:
It was all thanks to you… All the happiness of this world,
joy that was never meant for me…

name: King of Ideals, Saber
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or less, this card gets +1000 power.
【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose another of your 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: You are a worthy opponent.

name: Kiritsugu - Belief in Justice
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When damage from this card is canceled during its attack, if a card named "Origin Shot" is in your climax area, you may choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters on the center stage, and put it into your opponent's stock.
flavor_text:
I will break this endless cycle.
And the Holy Grail alone can make that possible.

name: Kiritsugu - Style of Heresy
ability: 【AUTO】［(2)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, seach your deck for up to one card named ""Riding" Skill, Saber", reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, your opponent puts the bottom card of his or her stock into the waiting room.
flavor_text: A full frontal confrontation is not my style.

name: Silent Assistant, Maiya
ability: 【CONT】 If you have a yellow climax in your climax area, this card gets +1 soul.
【CONT】 All of your other characters named "Kiritsugu - Belief in Justice" get +1000 power.
flavor_text: Kiritsugu picked me up, off the ground, anyway. He's free to use my life as he sees fit.

name: Beautiful King of Knights, Saber
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of characters your opponent has is three or less, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: I'm used to the fact that my appearance is different from what most people would have imagined.

name: Saber - "Magic Power Unleashed"
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm ［(1)］ Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: If I cannot block your blade, I need only kill you before it strikes.

name: Irisviel - Vessel of the Holy Grail
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to two of your other 《Servant》 characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
【AUTO】【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 2 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a yellow card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them.)
flavor_text: I knew you'd come. I had faith you would make it here.

name: Saber - End of Reign
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is three or less, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: I, I am unworthy……

name: Irisviel - Living as a Human
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other characters get +500 power.

【AUTO】 Change ［Put this card into your waiting room］ At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Puppet of Einzbern, Irisviel" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: It's Avalon. From now on, you'll need its power more than I will. I'm sure it will help you during your final battle…

name: Future Hope, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: No Flavor Text

name: Kiritsugu - Pursuit of the Ideal
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other characters named "Parts of Kiritsugu, Maiya".
flavor_text: The blood I spill in Fuyuki City, will be the last blood humanity will ever shed.

name: Parts of Kiritsugu, Maiya
flavor_text: No Flavor Text

name: Mother and Child, Irisviel & Ilya
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond／""Mage-Killer" Kiritsugu" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Mage-Killer" Kiritsugu" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

【AUTO】 Bond／"Puppet of Einzbern, Irisviel" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Puppet of Einzbern, Irisviel" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Ilya only needs Kiritsugu and Mommy with her to be happy.

name: Saber - Noble Phantasm Unleashed
ability: 【AUTO】［(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "Excalibur" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, put it into your opponent's memory, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Innocent Girl, Ilya
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Master》 or 《Homunculus》 characters get +500 power.
flavor_text: There it is! I found one, too!

name: Irisviel von Einzbern
ability: 【AUTO】［(2)] When a yellow climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text:
Eight more years, and your fight will come to an end.
And our ideal will become reality.

name: "Riding" Skill, Saber
flavor_text: My riding skill allows me to command any "beast or vehicle".

name: Maiya Hisau
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or less, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: From now on, this will be your base of operations.

name: "Invisible Air" Saber
ability: 【AUTO】[Reveal any number of climax cards in your hand] At the beginning of your battle step of this card's battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of cards revealed.
flavor_text: You can't believe that a nice face will save you from my blade, can you.

name: Kiritsugu - Time to Hunt
flavor_text: ……let us see what you can do, my adorable King of Knights.

name: "Mage-Killer" Kiritsugu
ability: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.）
flavor_text: We can all mount an attack.

name: Assistant Machine, Maiya
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【AUTO】［(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Understood.

name: "First Time Out" Irisviel von Einzbern
flavor_text: This---is the first time I've ventured into the world outside.

name: Search for Chestnut Bud
ability: Each player puts the top three cards of his or her deck into the waiting room. If the number of level 1 or less characters put into your waiting room with this effect is more than the number of level 0 or less characters put into your opponent's waiting room with this effect, you may draw a card.
Put this card into your stock.
flavor_text: I'm so high up!

name: Demolition
ability: 【COUNTER】 Each player returns all cards in his or her waiting room into his or her deck. Each player shuffles his or her deck afterwards. Choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Einzbern Castle
ability: If the number of climax cards in your waiting room is one or less, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Search your deck for up to one 《Weapon》 or 《Alchemy》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Sign of Determination
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Excalibur
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Loyal and Brave, Lancer

ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is five or more, this card gets +1000 power.

ability: 【AUTO】 When one of your characters attacks, choose another of your 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Arondight
ability: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1500 multiplied by that character's cost.
flavor_text: Saber: "A… Arondight… You can't be-"

name: Identity of the Fallen Knight
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
（【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: --and "he" lost everything.

name: Parting with Rin
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There is only one saying left to pass on as a representative of the past generations, to the offspring of the proud Tohsaka family."

name: Sword of Rupture, Ea
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Behold the glory-- Enuma Elish!

name: Kirei - The Emptiness Within
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《Master》 characters get +1000 power.

【AUTO】 Change ［(4) Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Kirei Kotomine" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: I admit it, I am an empty man.

name: Throbbing Soul, Kirei
ability: 【AUTO】［Put a 《Master》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: No Flavor Text

name: Sadistic Artist, Caster
ability: 【AUTO】[Put another character on your stage into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have a blue climax in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor_text:
You shan't be disappointed, Ryunosuke.
This will be, as you might say, the coolest thing you'll ever see.

name: Kirei Kotomine
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【ACT】［(2) 【REST】 two of your characters］ Search your deck for up to one 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: I will fear no evil, for you are with me.

name: Aesthetics of Death, Caster
ability: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Prank of Fate" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on the center stage, search your deck for up to one level 0 or lower character, and put it on any position of your stage. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: Indeed! Exactly so! Impressive, Ryunosuke!

name: Receiving New Flesh, Archer
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters you have is three or more, this unit gets "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
【ACT】［(1)] Choose one of your 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You really are quite a difficult man.

name: Regulator, Risei
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavor_text: …let's get to the point.

name: Many, but One, Assassin
ability: 【ACT】［【REST】 two of your 《Master》 characters] Until end of turn, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking.
flavor_text: And this time, we shall become true shadow.

name: Mage Apprentice, Kirei
flavor_text: No Flavor Text

name: Psycho Killer, Ryunosuke
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your or your opponent's character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Go get them, Sir Bluebeard!

name: Protector of the Faith, Kirei
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is 5 or more, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "The Eighth Contract" is in your climax area, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: …entertainment, you mean joy?

name: Flames of Purgatory
ability: Search your deck for up to one 《Master》 character and up to one 《Servant》 character, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. Choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Put this card into your clock.
flavor_text: That's impossible… There's no way!

name: Sea Monster
ability: Choose a character in your hand, and put it into your memory face down. Your opponent chooses the number 2 or 3. Reveal the face down card, and if that card is a character of a level that matches the number that your opponent chose, put it on any position of your stage. If it is not, put that card into your waiting room.
flavor_text:
It glistens with a foul slime which induces nausea.
It is truly an island made of flesh.

name: The Eighth Contract
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: Until I find my answer, I will gladly be your jester…

name: Prank of Fate
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text:
I have obtained the means to command a demonic legion.
What do you think, Jeanne!

name: Proxy Master, Irisviel
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets +1 soul.
flavor_text: SECRET

name: Saber in a Dark Suit
ability: 【ACT】[【REST】 two of your characters] This card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You will surely survive. I will protect you until the end.

name: Top Class, Saber
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: SECRET

name: Hill of Camlann
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: I'm sorry...

name: "Shallow Blooded" Magus, Waver
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavor_text: A battle of pure skill, where titles and influence mean nothing. It's the perfect place for me.

name: Mini Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your character's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Mini Rider
ability: 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your opponent's characters on the center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.

name: Mini Waver
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as REST.)

name: Mini Archer
ability: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Master of the Golden Sheath, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose another of your <<Master>> or <<Homunculus>> characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: When the never-ending war draws to a close, she will be the one who grasps the Holy Grail.

name: Moment of Peace, Saber
ability: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Illya & Irisviel
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Illya will always be with mother.

name: Saber & Irisviel & Ilya
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, choose another of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Style of a King, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your other <<Master>> or <<Homunculus>> characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: A king is a martyr to their ideals.

name: Summoned Heroine, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When another of your 《Master》 or 《Homunculus》 character is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Irisviel von Einzbern
ability: 【AUTO】[2] When a yellow climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Very well, Saber. Grant me victory!

name: Maiya Hisau
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or less, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: Focus on what matters now. Think of nothing else...

name: "Riding" Skill, Saber
flavor_text: My Riding skill allows me to command any beast or vehicle.

name: "Invisible Air" Saber
ability: 【AUTO】[Reveal any number of climax cards in your hand] At the beginning of your battle step of this card's battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of cards revealed.(The revealed cards are returned to hand)

name: "Mage-Killer" Kiritsugu
ability: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) & Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Non-magical attacks are what mages are truly vulnerable to.

name: Assistant Machine, Maiya
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【AUTO】[(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Understood.

name: “First Time Out” Irisviel von Einzbern
flavor_text: This is the first time I've ventured into the world outside.

name: Einzbern Castle
ability: If the number of climax cards in your waiting room is one or less, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Search your deck for up to one 《Weapon》 or 《Alchemy》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: I hereby swear. That I shall be all the good in the world.

name: Proof of Entry, Waver
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is two or less, this card gets +1500 power.
【AUTO】【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 0 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a green card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them.)
flavor_text: I've got a command seal, too! The Grail chose me!

name: Loyal and Brave, Lancer
flavor_text: Yes, master.

name: Clock Tower Elite, Kayneth
flavor_text: Come forth, Lancer.

name: Gordius Wheel
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Go, Gordius Wheel!

name: Gae Dearg
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Gash, Gae Dearg!
